title: League not opening pls help
body:
When I click launch to go to the login page, it immediately closes. I start to see it open, but then it closes. Can someone help to see what is wrong?
Thank You

replies.body: Along the lines of what others have suggested here, the overall issue may be that some security setting either with your OS or program is blocking the patcher from launching.  I recommend using the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to get this resolved for good!  Let me know if you have any questions!

This happened to me when i had AVAST, you probably have an anti-virus program that thought league was malware and blocked it. check your anti-virus programs and look for the quarantine history on them. if that doesn't work.. yeah try repairing files.
Try right clicking the icon and running as administrator. If that doesnt work try repairing the league files, and if that doesnt work uninstall and reinstall league.
